description: This table extracts the related multiple response History - Primary Referral Diagnosis Modifiers (I RFL 992) item.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_DX_MOD_ID
columns.description: History item to track changes made to add codes associated with the primary referral diagnosis during triage.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_DX_MOD_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.
